programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia

programme.title: Black Hollow Cage
programme.desc: A girl finds among the trees a mysterious cubic device with the ability to change the past.

programme.title: Dead Bite
programme.desc: A comedy-horror venture about an aspiring hiphop group who head to Mermaid Island to shoot a music video, expecting bikini-clad girls and sunshine but end up battling ghouls and demons.

programme.title: Friend Game The Movie Part 1
programme.desc: The first of a two-part live-action adaptation of popular manga series 'Tomodachi Game', about a reality game that its friends against each other in the pursuit of money.

programme.title: The Slit Mouthed Woman 2
programme.desc: Based on an urban legend, a high school student is disfigured when a deranged jilted lover splashes acid on her. She sinks deeper and deeper into depression and eventually becomes a mass murderer.

programme.title: Matilahnak
programme.desc: Apabila penduduk Kampung Matilahnak tidak lagi takut pada hantu, Boss, selaku ketua hantu perlu mencari jalan supaya orang kampung kembali takutkan mereka.

programme.title: Radio Silence
programme.desc: A pirate radio host is the only person who can prevent a serial killer from slaying his next victim, but saving one innocent soul means sacrificing another.

programme.title: Minyak Dagu Untuk Ika
programme.desc: A man falls in love with his supervisor but due their different social status, he has no chance of gaining her affection. But he does not give up and resorts to the use of black magic.

programme.title: The Werewolf Game - The Beast Side
programme.desc: A high school girl has to kill 9 others of high school students in order to survive from the game.

programme.title: Ghost Father
programme.desc: A student is hired as a live-in nanny to a wealthy woman's little girl. But spooky things happen every night in the lonely secluded mansion. Will the truth be exposed?

programme.title: Arumi
programme.desc: 15 years after the murder of her mother and sister, Rasty invites four friends to her parents' villa. Intending only to vacation at the villa, they end up with far more than they bargained for.

programme.title: The Slit Mouthed Woman
programme.desc: Decades ago, a suburb was terrorized by the spirit of a woman in a surgical mask who asked victims, "Am I pretty?" before slaughtering them. Now, police and teachers must end a new wave of carnage.

programme.title: Make Me Shudder

programme.title: Five Times Salah in a City Ep07
programme.desc: Is it possible to visit a city within the space of five salah times? But we have managed to fit in the most spectacular places in many cities within five salah times.

programme.title: The Great Indian Rasoi S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Chef Ranveer Brar savours the robust flavors of Ahmedabadi cuisine. From different varieties of Khaman to Patra, he indulges in some of the best vegetarian dishes from the colorful state of Gujarat.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate Ep03
programme.desc: Kali ini Kak Kek akan mencuba Nasi Kerabu yang dihidangkan dengan aneka lauk terutamanya solok lado, daging bakar dan ayam percik di beberapa kedai makan yang terkenal.

programme.title: Teroka Lokal Ep01
programme.desc: Dalam episod ini, Marsha menjelajah Chow Kit Road Kuala Lumpur dengan bantuan Manjeet yang banyak memberi informasi baru. Marsha juga mencuba untuk membuat Apam Balik bersama peniaga di tepi jalan.

programme.title: Michael Ang's Halal Kitchen Ep09
programme.desc: Dari Resipi Barat, Cina, Fusion dan sebagainya, Michael akan berkongsi nasihat degan petua bagaimana pelbagai hidangan boleh dicipta semula utuk memenuhi citrasa masyarakat gastronomi halal.

programme.title: Roda Panas Ep07
programme.desc: Dalam episod ini, Remy Ishak berjumpa dengan pengasas kosmetik, Tinie Sulaiman yang mempunyai Lamborghini Huracan dan Nissan GTR R35.

programme.title: Australia by Design Ep04
programme.desc: In our search for Australia's best architectural statement, we find a mosque designed for the modern age, and a house built for the clouds.

programme.title: Makers Malaysia Ep05
programme.desc: Makers Malaysia memperkenalkan pengasas produk kecantikan kulit tempatan, Ainaa Beauty iaitu Hafiz dan isterinya Ainaa dan juga memperkenalkan Sasibai Kimis yang menubuhkan Earth Heir.

programme.title: Dua's of the Believer Ep02

programme.title: Eat, Fun & Pray 001 Ep01

programme.title: Curries of India Ep09
programme.desc: Chef Ranveer Brar and Chef Kunal Kapur argue about the origin of Murgh Mussalam recipe and linkit to their hometowns, Lucknow and Delhi. The duo then cook the authentic recipe of Murg Mussalam.

programme.title: Bahagia Kasihmu
programme.desc: Tasnim akhirnya pulang ke pangkuan keluarga di saat bapanya sangat rindukan Tasnim. Adik-beradiknya teruja menyambut kepulangan Tasnim. Sebaliknya ibu Tasnim masih belum dapat menerimanya.

programme.title: Kafe Duke
programme.desc: Ilyas geram dengan seorang pelanggan baru di Duke Caf kerana wanita itu terlalu cerewet dengan rasa masakan yang diterimanya. Sameon dan Alberto pula menuduhnya tak pandai melayani wanita.

programme.title: Menjemput Ajal Di Tanah Suci
programme.desc: Hidup Syifa tidak lama lagi kerana ada ketumbuhan. Menurut doktor hayatnya cuma kira-kira 3 bulan lagi, teman lelakinya berpendapat adalah terbaik untuk mereka tidak ketemu lagi. Syifa pasrah.

programme.title: Bersamamu

programme.title: Boboiboy

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Planet
programme.desc: Ketika Awesome Ones dalam penerbangan mengelilingi dunia untuk menggunakan penyambung Core Cell sebagai sumber tenaga terbuka, kapal terbang tiba-tiba diserang terhempas di laut.

programme.title: Zulhijjah Menggamit Rindu

programme.title: Hatimu Sedingin Salju

programme.title: Buletin Utama

programme.title: Mamak Cupcake
